title: 1st INTERNATIONAL CONGRESS OF PHONETICS AND POETICS
listener_title: Would you like to be a listener?
listener_subtitle: Leave us your email address and we will send you the latest news about the congress
participant_title: Would you like to participate as a speaker?
interest_declaration_subtitle: If you are interested in being part of the first congress of phonetics and poetics, complete this form so we can plan your participation.

form.policy_privacy: The data sent through this form will only be used to contact the applicants of the congress and will not be shared with third parties.
